short_description: fastpath function used to apply predefined string operation on a specified target column range.
long_description: fastpath function used to apply predefined string operation on a specified target column range.

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.rDescription: The relation that contains input data.
input_tables.description: The relation that contains input data.

argument_clauses.name: TargetColumns
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table columns for which string operation needs to be performed.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input table columns for which string operation needs to be performed.

argument_clauses.name: OutputColumns
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the names to give to the output columns which will contain output of the string opeation on the columns values.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the names to give to the output columns which will contain output of the string opeation on the columns values.

argument_clauses.name: Accumulate
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table columns to copy to the output table. By default, the function copies no input table columns to the output table.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input table columns to copy to the output table. By default, the function copies no input table columns to the output table.

argument_clauses.name: StringOperation
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the string method which will be used on the target columns. Supported StringOperation are {TOUPPER,TOLOWER,STRINGTRIM,STRINGCON,SIGMOID,STRINGPAD,STRINGLIKE,STRINGINDEX,INITCAP,TRIMSPACES,CHARTOHEXINT,STRINGREVERSE,UNICODESTRING,SUBSTRING,GETNCHARS}.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the string method which will be used on the target columns. Supported StringOperation are {TOUPPER,TOLOWER,STRINGTRIM,STRINGCON,SIGMOID,STRINGPAD,STRINGLIKE,STRINGINDEX,INITCAP,TRIMSPACES,CHARTOHEXINT,STRINGREVERSE,UNICODESTRING,SUBSTRING,GETNCHARS}.

argument_clauses.name: OperatingSide
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the operating side to consider while performing operations like stringPad, getNchars. Supported OperatingSide are {LEFT,RIGHT}.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the operating side to consider while performing operations like stringPad, getNchars. Supported OperatingSide are {LEFT,RIGHT}.

argument_clauses.name: InPlace
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify whether to use the same column name for the resulted target columns.
argument_clauses.description: Specify whether to use the same column name for the resulted target columns.

argument_clauses.name: String
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the names of a string that will be used as an input parameter while applying string operation.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the names of a string that will be used as an input parameter while applying string operation.

argument_clauses.name: EscapeString
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the names of a string that will be used as an escape string while applying stringLike operation.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the names of a string that will be used as an escape string while applying stringLike operation.

argument_clauses.name: IsCaseSpecific
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify whether to consider uppercase letters(e.g. 'A') and lowercase letters(e.g. 'a') as same or different.
argument_clauses.description: Specify whether to consider uppercase letters(e.g. 'A') and lowercase letters(e.g. 'a') as same or different.

argument_clauses.name: IgnoreTrailingBlank
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify whether to ignore trailing blanks in the column strings. Used if the stringOperation is StringLike only.
argument_clauses.description: Specify whether to ignore trailing blanks in the column strings. Used if the stringOperation is StringLike only.

argument_clauses.name: StringLength
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the length of a string.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the length of a string.

argument_clauses.name: StartIndex
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the start index of the target column string. Used only if the string operation is SubString.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the start index of the target column string. Used only if the string operation is SubString.
